website_summaries.verdict: A durable bag that offers numerous storage options for longer travels.
pros: Eight pockets and a central compartment that can be split into two give you numerous storage options
Available in silver or blue, in either a 22" or 30" size
Self-repairing zippers can be secured in hideaway pockets
Lightweight and durable, with built-in puncture and tear resistance
cons: The 30" bag is too large to be used as a carry-on
Some buyers report issues with the zippers easily breaking

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag, some quality issues but the Customer service solved everything!
customer_reviews.text: Original Post: I just received this product and it has two major issuea a) the zipper on the bottom part has issues to close and b) the stiches are not located where they should be leaving the fabric weak. Revised: The customer service people contacted me to verify what was happening, they were very concerned about any quality issues. I mentioned what happened and they offered immediately a replacement and speak with their factories to make sure this won't happen again. I really appreciate the companies that take customer's opinion seriously. Thanks a lot to Coolife for this beautiful bag :)
customer_reviews.author: Miriam

customer_reviews.title: nice luggage
customer_reviews.text: great set of luggage with very convenient features! We travel a TON for work, internationally and domestically, these have held up beautifully through Europe, the UK, and cross-country so far. Looking forward to many trips with these pieces. Love how they fit inside one another, which is especially convenient for packing items that were shipped to a venue that need to be brought back. Wheels have been resilient against cobblestone driveways and other, more conventional terrain. Some slight scuffs have surfaced but nothing out of the ordinary. We pack these to the max and are definitely satisfied with their performance so far.
customer_reviews.author: Michael J.G.

customer_reviews.title: Very nice bag. Very sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Very nice bag. Very sturdy, small enough to go as carry on luggage and yet big enough to contain most of the items i want to carry. I intend to use it on an international flight this weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Andy Orji

customer_reviews.title: Shocked with how much space this bag has!!
customer_reviews.text: This bag a made very well and surprised me with how much space it has. I hadn't realized the whole bottom is storage along with the top half. Wheels are great quality and seem like they will be able to last a long time. Update: I took this bag on my 2 week European vacation and it worked great. I wanted it to carry on instead of paying $60 to check a bag. I'm happy to report it does fit in the overhead bin and I did get away with bringing it on until the end of my trip. United airline checked it for me (FREE) at the gate because they claimed it was too big.😁
customer_reviews.author: Evy

customer_reviews.title: Not self standing but nice bag overall!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this bag to carry my art supplies for paint night events. Both before and after inserting my supplies, the bag wouldn’t stand fully upright on its own. Maybe if the bag were filled with clothing in All sections, it might be more successful. Otherwise, this bag seems to be ideal for traveling as there are many pocket sections to keep you better organized.
customer_reviews.author: Shawna

customer_reviews.title: Quality of bag is very sturdy! Great Price
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my wife's trip overseas, and she loves it. Quality of bag is very sturdy! Great Price!
customer_reviews.author: Brian M Stewart

customer_reviews.title: It's a solid bag with quality materials, wish the ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a solid bag with quality materials, wish the handle was a bit longer and that there was a third cross strap between the two interior ones to hold down clothing. Other than that I got no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Cryper25

customer_reviews.title: Single use only-Broke on second trip
customer_reviews.text: Ok for one trip. The second use the end pocket zipper just came un-stitched. Treated it gently as a carry on but now it's worthless after only 2 months. Contacted vendor on warranty but no response. Move on, this bag is a waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: Daivd

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t stay closed
customer_reviews.text: On my second trip with this bag, I lost stuff out of the end pocket on both flights. It arrived with the zipper broken and all the contents gone.
customer_reviews.author: M. Monson

customer_reviews.title: Bottom compartment failed - Seller contacted me and fully refunded!! 5 stars for seller. bag=1 star
customer_reviews.text: Broke on 3rd day while traveling internationally - had to wrap it with a large ace bandage to travel with on busses,trains,airlines and cabs. Throughout the Scottish highlands. Unbalanced. Awful. Returned from international travel 7 days after return of bag was possible. Had never used bag until the trip to Scotland.bought intentionally to comply with tour guidelines. Miserable. After I reviewed the bag the seller contacted me and refunded the purchase. They were great!! Thank you!!! I will definitely give the seller 5 stars for customer service! One star for the bag tho
customer_reviews.author: lgt

customer_reviews.title: Right sized Bag
customer_reviews.text: This was just the right sized bag for one week trips. The 30 inch gives plenty of storage with compartments for shoes. Being a true Duffel it has a rigid back and ip the sides part way. If you are not packing it full it will not stand up. That's just part of being a Duffel.
customer_reviews.author: Poncho1958

customer_reviews.title: so it's completely useless now. Will be returning this bag as soon ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this bag for my girlfriend to take with us to Germany. The side zipper broke on the first opening. The compartment only has the one zipper, so it's completely useless now. Will be returning this bag as soon as we return from our trip. Hopefully the rest of the bag holds together for the next 3 weeks...
customer_reviews.author: Matt B.

customer_reviews.title: Good But Missing A Few Features
customer_reviews.text: I like the cubic capacity of the bag. It needs a removable shoulder strap to make it easier to carry and lift. It also needs some way to keep the lower level garment straps from falling back onto the packed goods until the packer is ready to secure them. Packing a pair of shoes in the zipped compartment near the base of the bag (when the bag is upright) provides needed stability in the upright position.
customer_reviews.author: E. Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Well Made
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for my Son for Fathers Day. He is a Long Haul Truck Driver, so he takes his life with him on the road. I know he’ll love all of the separate compartments, now he won’t have to have so many different bags to hold what he takes on the road. Zippers and stitching deserves a 5🌟
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: First impressions excellent.
customer_reviews.text: Just received my duffle and I like it so far...laid out well with plenty of pockets and a lot of space. Seems to be well constructed but time and use will tell. I reserve excellent durability rating until I have used it a few times. Looking forward to travel to put it to the test. Airlines destroyed my large Samsonite bag last trip...split it open at seams. Hope this bag fares better under similar treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Buyer Dave

customer_reviews.title: Excellent purchase
customer_reviews.text: I received this two days before a 10-day trip with multiple stops via air and auto. It holds much more than I expected and is excellent quality. Other reviews mentioned zipper problems, but I had none. I do agree that packing correctly helps it to stand up. I just put heavier items at the bottom of the bag as well as the small compartment on the bottom. I highly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie O.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of Compartments
customer_reviews.text: Con: I wish the center part were a little bigger. Pro: lots of compartments. This is great if you want to bring something smaller than a suitcase and is similar to a duffel without having the hassle of digging around to find what you need. There are pockets on the sides, front, and a different compartment on the bottom (which I find great to keep my shoes from the rest of my clothes). One other possible con is I've been questioned a couple of times whether or not this is an appropriate carryon size. It's kind of pushing it but most of the time no trouble.
customer_reviews.author: Shannon Battani

customer_reviews.title: Tennis racquets fit inside nicely
customer_reviews.text: Bought this rolling duffel bag to carry tennis racquets and my other clothes & gear for a week in Hawaii. Everything fit into this checked bag which was easy to easy to move around the airport and the condo complex in Kauai.
customer_reviews.author: kentennis

customer_reviews.title: Roomy, squishable carry-on
customer_reviews.text: Just received--I haven't used it yet, but I'm liking the way it looks! The bottom black portion has relatively sturdy sides, the rest is squishable which is what I need for my African safari trip. Roomy. Seems like the best of all worlds, meeting the "duffle luggage requirement".
customer_reviews.author: carol

customer_reviews.title: Zippers not up to the job
customer_reviews.text: The first time I used the duffle I checked it on a flight to Calgary. When it came down the luggage carousel the entire duffle had been encased in a plastic bag by the baggage handlers. The zipper between the bottom compartment and top had separated. Fortunately I hadn't lost anything. Before I flew back I bought luggage straps from Amazon which worked fine to keep everything together. I'll keep the duffle, as its capacity and organizational design are what I need. Just have to use luggage straps from now on. BTW, the weight when filled was 23 lbs., so I didn't overfill it.
customer_reviews.author: Richard Pattie

customer_reviews.title: For the money not bad
customer_reviews.text: The bags are not bad, especially if you are a vacation traveler. I happen travel for work and they might not have been the best choice for me. Maybe I was trying to save a few bucks. They are light and the are good looking with plenty of space and lots of pockets. Rolling drop bottom duffels are definitely the way to go with luggage charges the way they are on some airline. You can fit a ton of stuff in these and still be under the 50lbs. mark. good travels.
customer_reviews.author: Dieseldean

customer_reviews.title: Bad zippers
customer_reviews.text: Would not purchace this duffel,again,. Made one trip,with me on,a Cruise to Mexico. On,the return trip,the side zipped stopped working properly and now will not zip closed at all. Dot very sturdy and likes to,fall over espically. Now that I can't put anything in the bottom die,to,the broken zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Jeddy

customer_reviews.title: Sooner or later TSA is going to rip this apart.
customer_reviews.text: Well made but poor design. 7 or 8 compartments, all but one with zippers, handles and flaps everywhere. Unless it is packed solid, it doesn't stand up and if it is packed solid it is too large on most flights to carry on.
customer_reviews.author: V. GA

customer_reviews.title: nice design, would like more robust design
customer_reviews.text: I really like the design of this bag -- definitely looked better than any other carry-on size wheeled duffle. I'd pay $50 more if it had more robust zippers and handles. I use this four nights a week, and it has survived a month in the field, but I feel like I have to be careful of the zippers and the handles. How much more would a heavy-duty zipper cost? I'll update this review after three months.
customer_reviews.author: Greg Demmitt

customer_reviews.title: Well constructed, lots of compartments
customer_reviews.text: This is just the right size to hold everything I need for travel, with lots of handy compartments. I use the big zippered compartment under the main area for my pillow! The wheels work well on various surfaces and the handle is reliable and smooth to operate. This is, however, a very heavy case before you put anything in it - keep that in mind when you're loading it up.
customer_reviews.author: Sinnickel

customer_reviews.title: Zipper broke ON FIRST USE
customer_reviews.text: The FIRST time i ever used this bag, it broke. An outside pocket zipper had broken somewhere between me checking my bag for my flight and getting it at baggage claim. When i took my bag off the carousel the pocket was hanging open, empty, and all my items that had been in that pocket were no where to be found, lost some where during my travels. Super disappointing as I had to dig forEVER to find a roller duffle bag with a shoe compartment! Really disappointed in the product and that it actually cost me MORE by losing expensive items due to the defective zipper.
customer_reviews.author: Cinthanie

customer_reviews.title: Cheap, yeah.  Wish I hadn't bought.
customer_reviews.text: I used this bag for a short trip into NYC. Just wanted something to avoid carrying work stuff on my shoulders.. The load balance was horrible. The wheels did not roll easily. The 2 wheels in the back meant the bag fell over constantly. I had maybe 1/3 of what could fit. I should have used my 4 wheel hard side suitcase instead of wasting money
customer_reviews.author: cheree

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my hubs for work to replace and old, worn-out over the should duffle bag. He is a truck driver and carries all his essentials with him every day - reflective vest, disinfecting wipes, tire thumping stick, jacket, extra clothes, greasy gloves, food, etc. This bag is the right size, durable and has lots of compartments to separate everything. And his bag gets heavy so the wheels are perfect and very tough.
customer_reviews.author: Anika Johnston

customer_reviews.title: Basic, lightweight duffel
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for an overseas trip where weight and item protection is the key factor. I can lock the two main zipper compartments, protection from thieves. Easy access, handy side pockets that I would not use for checked luggage, but good for a road trip. I had a larger one @ 35" that was too heavy, packed. This one @ 30" is manageable by myself. The silver color is handsome. A very good bag for the money.
customer_reviews.author: GJ Simmons

customer_reviews.title: Weak zippers
customer_reviews.text: I just left baggage claim after checking this brand new bag on my flight. The bag was not over packed. One of the zippers failed. I lost everything in that pocket. Stay away from this bag for flying.
customer_reviews.author: Chris

customer_reviews.title: Very durable
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work to transport my clothing samples and load it to 50lbs to meet flight weight restrictions. It has held up for over 3 dozen roundtrip flights and hauling in an out of trunks of rental cars a weeks at a time. Really like that you can separate items in the upper and lower section, besides the end zippers.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Sherman

customer_reviews.title: Much too large for an airplane carry on
customer_reviews.text: Nice bag, good quality, but at 13" plus high (more than the website description states) it will be denied boarding on some flights. Vendors response is to underpack it, but what is the point?
customer_reviews.author: MJ

customer_reviews.title: sturdy and lots of room for my stuff
customer_reviews.text: I have traveled a few time now with this luggage and so far so good. The zippers work great - but I am careful when zipping because of the other reviews that state the zippers broke. Highly recommended, just go easy on the zippers!
customer_reviews.author: Dog Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Not the color in picture
customer_reviews.text: Ordered the navy blue and it's nothing like the medium blue in the picture that the person I was buying it for wanted. Looks very dark, almost black. Also came in an Amazon box twice its size so I couldn't use it to wrap as a present. The whole thing is very disappointing and the recipient hasn't even used it yet!
customer_reviews.author: charley'slove

customer_reviews.title: updated review!  Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: Today is the 2nd time I used ithis bag and the zipper busted. 12 days past the date I can return, for $60 you should be able to find a better quality bag that might actually have some longevity. Not worth the money keep shopping... after Posting a negative review, the seller of this bag contacted me and has offered a replacement bag. This bag has a lot of functions and I love the bag because I can carry so much with me. So I was very disappointed when the zipper busted but the seller offered to send a replacement for the defective bag.
customer_reviews.author: Carol Creech

customer_reviews.title: Fabric Ripped
customer_reviews.text: I loved the shape and size and versatility of this bag so much that bought on for my son and for me. My son's was fine until he arrived in Spain from NY--then we noticed the fabric was ripped. There was a small rip in mine the day it arrived--small enough that I sewed it shut, but still. Not as robust as I had hoped.
customer_reviews.author: TXNell

customer_reviews.title: Floppy
customer_reviews.text: Reviews are right, GREAT is packed full...love the two levels ...but leave a little room and it flops all over and even opening it becomes difficult. was sorry as the design idea is great but leaves a lot to be desired in practice
customer_reviews.author: Gatita52

customer_reviews.title: 100% as advertised (Great for cruise ship work)
customer_reviews.text: The materials are nice and sturdy. I've used it on a few trips so far, no problems at all. It is a little wobbly trying to stand up on its own, but that's the price you pay for it being able to collapse it into a 5" footprint. I work on a cruise ship, and this is perfect for me as my primary carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: J. Bavousett

customer_reviews.title: Zipper problem
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent, well-designed small bag for traveling light. Holds more than it looks like it could. I ordered one and then a second one after using the first on a week-long trip. But on the second one, which I just used for the first time on a recent trip, the zipper on one of the end pockets broke on first use. I will have to return it. Not a good sign re: durability.
customer_reviews.author: Hester Prynne

customer_reviews.title: Not carry on
customer_reviews.text: The bag seems ok and is very roomy. Too roomy. No way is the 22in a carry on for a trip to Europe. Maybe you could get away with it on a US carrier. The manufacturer says that you can under pack it to meet requirements, but I have the bag about 3/4 full and it does not meet requirements. I even tried a luggage strap to squeeze it tighter but the frame structure of the bag still exceeds the limits. I am very disappointed as I wanted a carry on for my trip to italy. I leave tomorrow so there is no time to find another bag.
customer_reviews.author: Erin Bevan

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag but maybe not sturdy enough for airline travel
customer_reviews.text: Really liked the size of the bag 30”, bought it to carry scuba equipment. Everything fits nicely and seemed sturdy enough. On our first trip we found that the rails for the pull out handle had been dented which caused us to be unable to pull out the handle. Bag was a bit heavy to hand carry! We contacted the Coolife Luggage company and they offered replacement or refund immediately! Very good customer service!!
customer_reviews.author: Ada Visser

customer_reviews.title: Nice bag for travel
customer_reviews.text: Traveled to Europe via plane and train. This bag holds alot of stuff. It passed through four plane rides and two train rides with only a couple of scuffs to show after. Because it holds quite a bit it can get heavy but I had little trouble with it. (I am small 55 yr old 😉 woman)
customer_reviews.author: A. Frank

customer_reviews.title: Excellent bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 1 just to see what the fuss was all about.. but OMG! The material is very sturdy and pockets everywhere! I bought this for a 7 day cruise. Most definitely worth the money and a space saver since it can be flatten. I love it so much I bought another 22inch and the 30 inch which will be my check in bag. Can't wait to use it. I did add insurance just in case but I like to stay on the safe side.
customer_reviews.author: Fix

customer_reviews.title: Don’t purchase
customer_reviews.text: Zipper broke after 1st use. Has a warranty but company didn’t honor it. They Made me work through Amazon and they gave a partial refund.
customer_reviews.author: MBJ

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Quality. Study. Worth it.
customer_reviews.text: Superb quality. Better than expected. Definitely worth the extra money. It can tell that this will last for many years even with relatively frequent travel. Also there are tons of pockets and space yet it still fits in the overhead. Unless you're Diana Ross, you can get a week's worth of stuff in here.
customer_reviews.author: Clubware

customer_reviews.title: Product is sturdy and well made
customer_reviews.text: I like this duffel bag because it is well made with quality material. The design is ideal for a weekend getaway. I ordered the small item and it has many spaces and compartments. It rolls easily and the zippers work well. I would just urge the buyers to pay attention to the sizing, I didn't and ordered the small bag when I really wanted the large one.
customer_reviews.author: La Loopy

customer_reviews.title: a duffle bag and suit case all in one unit
customer_reviews.text: Just packing my new duffle bag for an eighteen day holiday. Am delighted to see it has two section to pack in, the hard box size below the duffle bag like a regular suitcase . I so appreciate all the pocket. My husband is delight with his own duffle bag and say he is surprised with all the room and still has space for more thing, but is finished. I am expecting this will be a good choice for us. Nellie Levesque
customer_reviews.author: Nellie levesque

customer_reviews.title: Won’t stand up but good suze
customer_reviews.text: Did not like the lack of internal structure. There was NO WAY TO MAKE IT STAND UP. I did like the fact that it can hold a lot including a rug I bought in Mexico. I barely used the outside pockets as they don’t fasten well.
customer_reviews.author: Debracake

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is an awesome product!!! The only negative thing that I could say is the bottom of the luggage will most likely scratch and become worn. I think the bottom part that stands up should be reinforced with a more lasting material.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: big enough.
customer_reviews.text: I have traveled with this bag for a few months now and very happy with it. lots of room and ease to pull and roll. wheels are quiet. ether you travel for a week or a night, this bag is great. happy with it so far.
customer_reviews.author: anthony merlo

customer_reviews.title: A waste of my money.
customer_reviews.text: Did not like this product. The extra compartment located at the bottom weighed heavier than the duffel bag itself. The attached stand was useless in preventing duffel bag from tilting over. The space inside bag was much too small.
customer_reviews.author: Precious5

customer_reviews.title: Good buy
customer_reviews.text: Used this for a trip to Juarez, Mexico. I had it stuffed all the way around . When I checked the weight to be sure I wasn’t over the baggage limit for the plane ride to El Paso it weight 23lbs. I liked the wheels it held up well on my walk across the Santa Fe bridge into Mexico it was not heavy.
customer_reviews.author: Mikaiela82

customer_reviews.title: Good  carry all
customer_reviews.text: Although the shipping box was mangle and needed to be resealed by someone the item inside was unharmed. This will be use as a gym bag and fits the bill perfectly. Lots of pockets and more than enough storage.
customer_reviews.author: Hurricane Hal

customer_reviews.title: WIsh I could give 0 stars
customer_reviews.text: Don't buy this bag!!!! Thought we fixed it the first time we used it, but sure enough, the same thing happened the 2nd time. The zipper came apart and clothes were everywhere. Now we are on vacation and we have to go look for another suitcase, as it is unusable. Piece of garbage!
customer_reviews.author: KG, Philly

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for Carry On...
customer_reviews.text: Planning 10 day European trip with my 2 sons. This bag is exactly what I wanted. Love the split levels for more intelligent packing. Makes packing so much easier.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent Osborne

customer_reviews.title: Compact and easy to pack and go
customer_reviews.text: Very well constructed and compact. As an airline carry in, it takes a bit of fiddling to get it into overhead bin yet we were successful even when ithe bag was packed nearly full. Easy to roll around. Shipping was on time. Great company to buy from
customer_reviews.author: sdshopper

customer_reviews.title: Great duffle and great price
customer_reviews.text: This is a great little duffle. It’s durable and good looking. Great pockets and compartments for all your needs and the perfect carry on with handles for lifting it into overhead. I bought this to replace an old one that was falling apart and this one is so much more practical. Considering buying the larger one too.
customer_reviews.author: Carol

customer_reviews.title: Bag has worked out great.
customer_reviews.text: Really pleased with the size and functionality of the bag. The bag is big so you need to roll it but it worked out really well on a recent trip and we were able to fit so much into it while still staying under the checked baggage weight requirements - definitely recommend.
customer_reviews.author: cdfalz

customer_reviews.title: Absolute junk!
customer_reviews.text: Didn't even make it on the plane without falling apart and had to buy a new one for the return flight.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality for Travel
customer_reviews.text: Might be ok for an evening at a hotel but would NEVER put this on an airline. Flimsy, poor construction. 2 stars as the material is ok.
customer_reviews.author: Dh

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase!
customer_reviews.text: This is the best duffel bag suitcase. It holds everything I need for several weeks and is very study and durable. I expect it to last many years.
customer_reviews.author: Linda Frank

customer_reviews.title: Survived a rugged test.
customer_reviews.text: I was hopeful this duffel would survive a cross country trip in Japan, and it did not disappoint. We were constantly on & off trains and wheeling it down streets, and it endured everything quite well. All zippers held, and I was impressed how much I could stuff into it. I bought one for myself & my daughter and each held up beautifully. They don’t stand on their own, but that wasn’t s problem got me.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Scovill

customer_reviews.title: Advertised Correctly
customer_reviews.text: As advertised - light weight - sturdy and practical. Have used on two trips thru airports in the last 35 days and have been pleased with mobility, packing space and durability.
customer_reviews.author: Van Eancheff

customer_reviews.title: This is the bag you need for all travels.
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son in law that's in the Navy. It is very durable. I loved the pockets and the wheels make it easier to move around the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Chandler

customer_reviews.title: It is made well
customer_reviews.text: I like the bottom section of it. I can put pants there and the top section it room also. pockets on the side are ok.
customer_reviews.author: franksc77

customer_reviews.title: Very Durable bag
customer_reviews.text: This item was ordered for use by a truck driver. It gets beaten up and still looks great! If he manages to beat it to death, I will easily order another one as it has made his life so much easier!
customer_reviews.author: Rtm

customer_reviews.title: Quality and very functional
customer_reviews.text: I have only taken it one one trip and like it very much. Time and travel will reveal durability but very pleased with it
customer_reviews.author: Grant Campbell

customer_reviews.title: Super strong and durable.
customer_reviews.text: Love this bag- have taken it everywhere from Jamaica to Ottawa. Get's a little roughed up on the plane but that's expected. However, zippers are strong and so are the buckles. So much space and not too heavy if you're using it as a duffel.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah Leitch

customer_reviews.title: Nicely made, looks good
customer_reviews.text: I really had hoped that this would be well made, and I was right! Nicely made, looks good, very smooth wheels, and not at all heavy. Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: rickw

customer_reviews.title: Great bag! Right price. Need a BIG bag? Purchase this one.
customer_reviews.text: It's a great bag. It's BIG!!! Worth the purchase. When you stand it up, the items in the bottom pocket will have weight on them so don't pit anything you don't want crushed in there. But over all a great bag for the right price. I'm actually on here to purchace another one!!
customer_reviews.author: John P.

customer_reviews.title: The best rolling duffle bag!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this rolling duffle bag for my son who was going to California for 7 days. He was able to fit everything he needed in it. Lots of compartments and it has a separate zipper base that great for items you don’t want wrinkled and it does stand up on its own when filled. It’s the best and the price was great!
customer_reviews.author: Jeannine

customer_reviews.title: Great for travel and holds a lot.
customer_reviews.text: This product is great - perfect size with lots of pockets. I've used it already and it was perfect. It holds alot of stuff and the rollers make it easy to bring along. I would recommend this product to everyone.
customer_reviews.author: Caroline Becker

customer_reviews.title: Little bag... great space!
customer_reviews.text: I had read the review on this product and loved the fact that people were stating there were a ton of pockets and space. I was not disappointed. It was great for carry on so we did not have to check luggage and it was very light weight. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S.

customer_reviews.title: Nice Looking.
customer_reviews.text: Well. It is too small for husband use. Looks nice but from my viewpoint an sewn area could unravel. Plan on keeping it when and if we move.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Roomy and Sturdy
customer_reviews.text: We just got this product delivered but we went through all the pockets, zippers, wheels, and handle, and it all appears to be very strong and sturdy, and very roomy. We love the two-section design so it is easier to find things. We look forward to taking it on an international trip.
customer_reviews.author: David

customer_reviews.title: Just as pictured and reviewed.
customer_reviews.text: This rolling duffle is sturdy, lightweight, convenient pockets. Have yet to fly with it but it suits my purpose just right.
customer_reviews.author: ffshopper

customer_reviews.title: Love it so far!
customer_reviews.text: I just got this in preparation for a trip to Morocco. I was looking for a smaller bag that could hold lots of stuff, and this is it! I have not traveled with it yet, but am sure it will be just the right bag! thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Kristin R Hirschmann

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Puece if Luggage....
customer_reviews.text: Worked as advertised from Los Angeles to Israel and back. No issues so far :)
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Timar

customer_reviews.title: Seems nice so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far, so good-seems to be a nice bag, rolls smooth and has a lot of space. The two levels of storage is a very nice feature and has all of the places covered that need to be covered.
customer_reviews.author: Eric Toft

customer_reviews.title: Well made prduct
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot, and previous luggage has not held well, having received the CooLife rolling duffle bag with wheels, I quickly saw the difference in the way it is made.. Durable material, and the side pockets sewn into the luggage, and not lose to dangle when being thrown around while loading and unloading at airports. I expect my luggage to go the distance, and give me many years of service ... Fred Gonzalez
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Terrific
customer_reviews.text: In a week this will be loaded and given its maiden voyage, but from the looks of it, it is a great piece of luggage. Thanks very much.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Bottomley

customer_reviews.title: Travel Bag
customer_reviews.text: Just what I wanted. Had another one similar but not made as well
customer_reviews.author: Gayla G Morrison

customer_reviews.title: Really like the compartment on the bottom
customer_reviews.text: I stuffed everything into this duffel. Really like the compartment on the bottom. Test it out this week on the road
customer_reviews.author: Mike C

customer_reviews.title: Arrived on time and as advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my son when he left for college; he seems to like it.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage.
customer_reviews.text: Just returned from vacation. Luggage was perfect and easy to roll.
customer_reviews.author: Stephen Rulo

customer_reviews.title: nice bag , ok for the money
customer_reviews.text: durable construction. one of the inner clothing strap clips doesn't work but over all the bag is nice with lots of room.
customer_reviews.author: Marla C.

customer_reviews.title: A great Duffel Travel Bag - Highly Recommended!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this Travel Duffel bag for a cruise that my wife and I just completed. It is really a great product. It holds a lot -- and given its light weight, when fully loaded, it still passes the 50 pound limit most airlines now have. I would highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: David L Chadwick

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Customer Services!
customer_reviews.text: The space and compartments of the bag are wonderful. Very nice bag. Broke it in the airport handling. I made the claim and immediately customer service responded and activated the guarantee. EXCELLENT SERVICE AND PERSONS!
customer_reviews.author: Lya D

customer_reviews.title: My new camping bag
customer_reviews.text: This bag has a lot of room. The bottom portion was able to hold 2 twin size air mattresses in their boxes along with an air pump, 2 small rugs, shower shoes, and running shoes. The rest of my clothes and camping gear fit in the rest of the bag. Handle and wheels were very sturdy.
customer_reviews.author: Dona Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Not durable
customer_reviews.text: 2nd trip with this bag the pocket zipper ripped open. Somewhere between me checking the bag and being picked up at baggage claim did the pocket open. Lost everything inside that pouch. And it was not over stuffed. Not durable at all.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas A Murphy

customer_reviews.title: This bag is a monster.
customer_reviews.text: I.m on a twelve day cruise and this bag allowed me to overpack, go figure. A normal bag just wouldn’t get it done, and it slipped under my bed in the cabin. If I ever need even more junk on my next cruise, I’ll buy another. Reminder, pack the end with the handle tight so it will stand up.
customer_reviews.author: laverne rogers

customer_reviews.title: Handle could be more sturdy
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for a nine-year old. The bag itself was very sturdy, roomy, and well made, but the handle seemed delicate. It is supposed to be adjustable for several heights, but we could only get it to the shorter height with a lot of finagling. We also worried it would break at some point since the metal in the handle was thin. We returned.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: worked perfect
customer_reviews.text: got this for my daughter for traveling with her college team and it holds up and works great. She loves it
customer_reviews.author: Robyn

customer_reviews.title: Have used three times from Iowa to California to Minnesota
customer_reviews.text: Sturdy. Holds lots of clothes. Minimal damage from airline use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: extremely satisfied after one trip
customer_reviews.text: The rolling duffel has only been one trip so far, but highly satisfied with the item. Rolls like a dream! Holds a weeks worth of clothing with ease, with room for more. We will see after a few more trips how it holds ups to the frequent airline gorilla treatment.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbie Schooley

customer_reviews.title: flimsy zippers that break easily.
customer_reviews.text: I gave a poor review initially because of weak zippers but was contacted by the manufacturer and given the impression they would address the problem and were definitely concerned about defects. I will give them a better rating for showing an interest in customer satisfaction.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Terrible quality
customer_reviews.text: Sadly the duffel bag has ripped at the seams. It’s brand new. Leaving for travel tomorrow. If I had a backup, I would not use it and would return it instead. Do not buy. Terrible quality. Spend more for quality product.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Miller

customer_reviews.title: Small bag but holds a lot
customer_reviews.text: Bought it for a week long golf vacation. Held everything for the trip just fine. I was pleasantly surprised by all it held. Some of the side pockets are too small to actually be useful but for the price it worked great.
customer_reviews.author: TManinNC

customer_reviews.title: Great buy
customer_reviews.text: It was perfect I just traveled overseas and for the first time my suitcase was under the allowable limit
customer_reviews.author: tova

customer_reviews.title: Handle might break
customer_reviews.text: Handle is cheap and Wobbley was worried about it breaking on my trip. Does hold alot. Wheels still seem good. Some zippers might break if over stuffed. Did a 35 day trip with it and it did hold up
customer_reviews.author: bryan

product_meta.title: Coolife Rolling Duffel Travel Duffel Bag Wheeled Duffel Suitcase Luggage 8 Pockets
feature_bullets: Made from 840D clothing that is lightweight but durable and offers resistance to punctures, tears, and abrasions.

Two main compartments of the luggage, while maximizing the use of space, the carry-on baggage can be placed in different categories which is both privacy and convenience. plus 8 Convenient pockets for maximum packing.
It features strong handles so you can lift and carry the holdall conveniently when travelling through busy train stations or airports. Durable wheels for smooth and easy wheeling through airports.
Locking Push-button retractable handle allows easy maneuver and its hide-away zipper pocket allows secured travel when needs to be checked in.

Dimensions:22" 12.2 x( 4.7~11.8) x 22.8 inches, 30" 14 x( 5~13) x 30.7inches (LxWxH)When the bag is fully expanded, When the bag is fully expanded, the width of the small duffle bag is 11.8inch,and the big one is 13inch.
